label: CASSIS
tag line: CASSIS is universal javascript/PHP that works on the client and the server for scalable application logic. http://cassisjs.org
Description1: CASSIS stands for: client and server scripting implementation subset. CASSIS Project is universal javascript (JS) that works on the client and the server for scalable application logic. The primary use-case is writing code to implement application logic that runs in browsers, especially dynamic interfaces that make use of XMLHTTPRequest (XHR/AJAX/AHAH), and also runs on web servers.
description:
#CASSIS is universal javascript/PHP that works on the client and the server for scalable application logic. http://cassisjs.org
##About CASSIS
![About CASSIS]()
 ###CASSIS stands for: client and server scripting implementation subset. CASSIS Project is universal javascript (JS) that works on the client and the server for scalable application logic. The primary use-case is writing code to implement application logic that runs in browsers, especially dynamic interfaces that make use of XMLHTTPRequest (XHR/AJAX/AHAH), and also runs on web servers.
